SELECT a.id, a.vehicle_id, v.vehicle_number, a.device_type, a.device_id, a.type, fn_get_alarm_type ( a.device_type, a.type ) type_name, fn_get_alarm_station ( a.station_type, a.station_id ) station, DATE_FORMAT( a.alarm_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) alarm_time, a.vehicle_track_id, a.lock_id, l.lock_device_id, l.store_id, l.seat, l.seat_index FROM tbl_alarm a, tbl_vehicle v, tbl_lock l WHERE a.vehicle_id = v.id AND a.lock_id = l.id AND a.vehicle_id = #{vehicleId} AND a.device_type = #{deviceType} AND a.device_id = #{deviceId} AND a.lock_id = #{lockId} AND a.type = #{alarmType} ORDER BY a.alarm_time DESC, a.id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.id alarm_id, a.vehicle_id, c.vehicle_number, a.device_type, a.device_id, a.lock_id, a.type alarm_type, fn_get_alarm_type ( a.device_type, a.type ) alarm_type_name, a.station_type, a.station_id, fn_get_alarm_station ( a.station_type, a.station_id ) station_name, DATE_FORMAT( a.alarm_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) alarm_time, a.vehicle_track_id FROM tbl_alarm a, tbl_vehicle c WHERE a.vehicle_id = c.id AND a.`status` = 0 ORDER BY a.alarm_time ASC, a.id ASC
